definition: Warren Buffett (1930-), the Sage of Omaha, US investor and philanthropist, principal owner of holding company Berkshire Hathaway
Ken Warren (1927-1991), American adventurer and river runner

sentences.english: Warren Buffett has a reputation as a bit of a wordsmith;
sentences.chinese: 沃伦巴菲特的口才出众是出了名的。

sentences.english: Mr Walendowski said he would tell police "the truth, " according to the complaint.
sentences.chinese: 根据控告书，沃伦斗斯基先生说他愿意告知警察实情。

sentences.english: Warren's eldest son is an art student, at St Martin's.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦的大儿子是圣马丁学院艺术系的学生。

sentences.english: But the Warren affair is only the latest chapter in an ongoing saga.
sentences.chinese: 不过，沃伦仅仅是一个未完传奇中的最后一章。

sentences.english: Warren, who has not publicly commented, has not been charged with any crime.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦本人并未发表任何评论，也未被以任何罪名起诉。

sentences.english: In Warren, Mich., Karen Alexander doesn't see a shift in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根州沃伦的卡伦亚历山大并不认为经济出现转机。

sentences.english: You and Warren?The rest of us are only sidekicks.
sentences.chinese: 除了你和沃伦，其它的人都只是助手。

sentences.english: Brandeis and Warren were swimming against the tide of history.
sentences.chinese: 布兰代斯和沃伦曾经是反潮流斗士。

sentences.english: Valentino later immortalized the dance on film.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦丁罗后来在电影里使这种舞蹈。

sentences.english: I would hate to have a mother like Orenstein.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌象沃伦斯坦的妈妈。

sentences.english: Warren Barfield performs live at The Rock Church.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦巴菲尔德执行居住在岩石教堂。

sentences.english: And my pal Warren won't be there forever.
sentences.chinese: 我的沃伦老哥不会永远呆在那儿等你。

sentences.english: Guidroz's son Warren Junior also is a fisherman.
sentences.chinese: 吉德罗斯的儿子沃伦少年也是一个渔夫。

sentences.english: Mr. Warren will retire from the directorship of the Microsoft soon.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦先生很快就要从微软公司主管职位上退下来。

sentences.english: Warren is an aspiring author as well as a spy.
sentences.chinese: 沃伦除了做间谍，还是个充满抱负的作家。

definition: Abbas (name)/Mahmoud Abbas (1935-), also called Abu Mazen, Palestinian leader, Chairman of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) from 2005
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
Moore or Moor (name)/see also 摩爾人|摩尔人[Mo2 er3 ren2]
